title: Sell E.H. Taylor Bourbon
metaTitle: Sell E.H. Taylor Bourbon | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your E.H. Taylor bourbon collection. We buy Warehouse C, Four Grain, Amaranth, Barrel Proof, and other limited releases. Direct offers.
heroSubhead: We buy E.H. Taylor bottles directly - from Barrel Proof to rare limited editions.
introParagraph: E.H. Taylor is one of the most sought-after brands from Buffalo Trace Distillery. We buy E.H. Taylor bottles directly, focusing on limited releases like Warehouse C Tornado Surviving, Four Grain, Amaranth, and older Barrel Proof batches. Submit photos and details to get a direct offer without auction fees.
whatWeBuy: E.H. Taylor Warehouse C Tornado Surviving
whatWeDoNotBuy: E.H. Taylor Small Batch (unless part of a larger collection)
photoChecklist: Front label showing the specific expression
Laser code (usually on the bottle under the label or near the bottom)
Fill level visible in the neck
Any damage to the tube or label
conditionFactors: Original tube is highly preferred and affects value
Strip stamp should be intact (no cracks or tears)
Laser codes help verify specific batches for Barrel Proof releases
Fill level should be high (into the neck)
pricingFactors: Specific expression (Four Grain vs Small Batch commands very different prices)
Presence and condition of the original tube
Condition of the tax strip or capsule

faqs.question: Which E.H. Taylor bottles are most valuable?
faqs.answer: Limited releases like Warehouse C Tornado Surviving, Cured Oak, and Four Grain are among the most valuable. Older batches of Barrel Proof also command a premium.

faqs.question: Do I need the tube to sell my E.H. Taylor?
faqs.answer: While not strictly required, the tube is a standard part of E.H. Taylor packaging. Missing tubes will reduce the offer price.

faqs.question: Do you buy E.H. Taylor Small Batch?
faqs.answer: We generally only buy Small Batch as part of a larger collection. We focus primarily on the limited releases and Single Barrel expressions.

faqs.question: How do I check the batch on my Barrel Proof?
faqs.answer: The batch can often be identified by the proof and the laser code on the bottle. Include a clear photo of the laser code and we can identify it for you.

faqs.question: Do you buy E.H. Taylor rye?
faqs.answer: Yes, we buy E.H. Taylor Straight Rye, especially older bottlings or as part of a collection.

faqs.question: What if my tube is damaged?
faqs.answer: We still buy bottles with damaged tubes, but the offer will be adjusted to reflect the cosmetic condition. Please include photos of the damage.
